class.name: UpscaleViewport
class.brief_description: Renders its children to a low-resolution SubViewport and upscales to the node size using a selectable shader upscaler.
class.description:
UpscaleViewport is an all-in-one render scaling node intended for Mobile, Forward+, and Compatibility renderers. Child nodes added to UpscaleViewport are automatically reparented under an internal SubViewport. The low-resolution SubViewport is then upscaled to this Control's size using a shader. 

Upscalers:
- FSR1: EASU+RCAS 2-pass upscaler
- CT1: fast 2x2 triangulation-based interpolation
- CT2: CT1 upscale + edge-adaptive sharpening (2-pass)
